snippet: Sidney Crosby, Pittsburgh’s star captain with a history of concussions, said he could not wait for Saturday’s opener of a lockout-shortened season.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins captain Sidney Crosby says he has recovered fully from series of concussions, and is excited for team's season-opener against Philadephia Flyers.
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby, Pittsburgh’s star captain with a history of concussions, said he could not wait for Saturday’s opener of a lockout-shortened season.

headline.seo: Penguins’ Sidney Crosby Healthy and Eager as N.H.L. Season Begins
headline.main: Captain and Optimism Healthy in Pittsburgh
